subject: p14387068
History: -year-old man with MRSA empyema decompensated cirrhosis with new pneumonia and acute shortness of breath. Assess for worsening pneumonia or edema.
Impression: Increased opacity of both lungs compatible with mild to moderate pulmonary edema superimposed on existing, perhaps slightly worsened, left sided pneumonia. Unchanged appearance to right basal empyema and accompanying atelectasis.
